mapper.select:
SELECT T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS FEE_NM , T1.FEE_CALC_UNIT_TP_CD FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD T1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL T2 --수수료기준상세 ON (T1.FEE_CD = T2.FEE_CD) WHERE #{perfDt} BETWEEN T2.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM
AND T1.FEE_CALC_UNIT_TP_CD = #{feeCalcUnitTpCd} /* 수수료계산단위유형코드 (101 : P추진단 플래너, 102 : P추진단 지국장, 201 : M추진단-일반(15등급), 202 : M추진단 지국장 */
AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , T1.FEE_CALC_UNIT_TP_CD
